xwikidoc.title: Wikidata Nobel Prize Laureates Importer
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}} This page allows to import some pages representing Nobel Prize laureates from [[Wikidata>>https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikidata]] and to browse it using the Graph Application. Wikidata is a collaboratively edited knowledge base hosted by the Wikimedia Foundation. In order import this data, run the query below at [[query.wikidata.org>>https://query.wikidata.org]], or directly hit [[this Wikidata link>>https://query.wikidata.org/#SELECT%20DISTINCT%20%3Fentity%20%3FentityLabel%20%3FentityDescription%20%3FtypeLabel%20%3Fcountry%20%3FcountryLabel%20%3Fprize%20%3FprizeLabel%20%3FimageUrl%20WHERE%20%7B%0A%20%20%3Fentity%20wdt%3AP166%20%3Fprize%20.%0A%20%20%3Fentity%20wdt%3AP31%20%3Ftype%20.%0A%20%20OPTIONAL%20%7B%3Fentity%20wdt%3AP27%20%3Fcountry%7D%20.%0A%20%20OPTIONAL%20%7B%3Fentity%20wdt%3AP18%20%3FimageUrl%7D%20.%0A%20%20FILTER%20%28%3Fprize%20IN%20%28wd%3AQ35637%2C%20wd%3AQ37922%2C%20wd%3AQ38104%2C%20wd%3AQ44585%2C%20wd%3AQ47170%2C%20wd%3AQ80061%29%20%29%0A%20%20SERVICE%20wikibase%3Alabel%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20bd%3AserviceParam%20wikibase%3Alanguage%20%22%5BAUTO_LANGUAGE%5D%2Cen%22%20.%0A%20%20%7D%0A%7D%0A]] and download the results in JSON, then copy the JSON text in the textarea below. {{/info}} == Export query (% style="font-size: 0.9em;" %)((( {{{ SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel ?entityDescription ?typeLabel ?country ?countryLabel ?prize ?prizeLabel ?imageUrl WHERE { ?entity wdt:P166 ?prize . ?entity wdt:P31 ?type . OPTIONAL {?entity wdt:P27 ?country} . OPTIONAL {?entity wdt:P18 ?imageUrl} . FILTER (?prize IN (wd:Q35637, wd:Q37922, wd:Q38104, wd:Q44585, wd:Q47170, wd:Q80061) ) SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" . } } }}} ))) {{velocity}} == Import form #set ($spaceName = $request.spaceName) #if ("$!spaceName" == '') #set ($spaceName = 'wiki') #end #set ($limit = $request.limit) #if ("$!limit" == '') #set ($limit = 10) #end #set ($mapping = $request.mapping) #if ("$!mapping" == '') #set ($mapping = " person:Person organization:Organization country:Country award:Award has-country:HasCountry Country has-award:HasAward Award has-wikidata-identifier:HasWikidataIdentifier string ") #end {{html clean="false"}}

{{/html}} {{/velocity}} {{groovy}} import org.xwiki.model.reference.DocumentReference def action = request.action def importer = services.component.componentManager.getInstance(org.xwiki.contrib.graph.internal.wikidata.WikidataImporter.class, "nobel-prize-laureates") if (action == "import") { def input = request.input def mapping = request.mapping def limit = Integer.parseInt(request.limit) if (input != null && input.trim().length() > 0) { importer.importData(input, mapping, false, request.spaceName, limit) } } {{/groovy}}
